com.soctec.soctec.achievements

Class Achievement

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.soctec.soctec.achievements.Achievement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Achievement
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Achievements can be configured many different ways and contains Demands which must be completed to complete the Achievement.
    Version:
    2.3
    Author:
    Carl-Henrik Hult, Joakim Schmidt
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Achievement

        public Achievement(java.lang.String name,
                   java.lang.String flavorText,
                   int points,
                   java.lang.String imageName,
                   java.lang.String id,
                   java.lang.String type)
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the achievement
        points - amount of points that the achievement is worth
        imageName - the filename of the image that goes with the achievement
        id - an internal ID, must be unique
        type - the type of the achievement (SIN/INF/COL/API)

    • Method Detail

      • createDemand

        public void createDemand(int type,
                         java.lang.String requirement,
                         java.lang.String extraPrimary,
                         java.lang.String extraSecondary,
                         int detail)
        Method used by AchievementCreator to create a Demand for the achievement
        Parameters:
        type - type of demand
        requirement - requirement for completion
        extraPrimary - extra data for constructing demand (equations, sensors etc)
        extraSecondary - extra data for constructing demand (mostly Vin Number)
        detail - numerical extra, mostly used API type demands

        public boolean isCompleted()

        Returns:

      • checkDemands

        public boolean checkDemands(int demandType,
                            java.lang.String demandContent)
        Checks and removes a single Demand that meet the requirements specified in parameters
        Parameters:
        demandType - type of Demand
        demandContent - requirement of Demand
        Returns:
        true if Demand was found and completed
